item.description:
Music by Gabrieli and Praetorius, plus an new piece written in the style of Monteverdi.  Performed on period instruments by some of the best young musicians in the country.

I'll get there early and save seats for the group.  Please keep your RSVP updated.  If you say that you're coming and later find out that you won't make it after all, please change your RSVP.  It's really helpful for me to know how many people are coming, so I know how many seats we need.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have an EU flag & I'll give people my mobile number

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Italian and German Early Music Concert
